content:
/>
V.iii.1.D.2.c
.
Example of Evaluating Osteomyelitis Following Review Exam for Initial Active Episode
Situation
:  Same facts as example shown in
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, 1.D.2.b
.  Subsequent review examination reveals the sinus tract was healed and there is no other evidence of active infection.
Result
:  Since the Veteran has not had a recurrent episode of osteomyelitis since service, a historical rating of 20 percent is not for application.  Take rating action under
38 CFR 3.105(e)
.
Coded Conclusion
:
1. SC (PTE INC)
5000
Osteomyelitis, right tibia, inactive
20% from 12-2-93
0% from 3-1-95
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D - Osteomyelitis
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D
